title: Mastercard in Talks to Acquire Stablecoin Tech Firm Zerohash for Around $2 Billion: Fortune
contentSnippet: The potential deal follows reports earlier this month that the credit card giant and Coinbase were each in late-stage talks to acquire stablecoin startup BVNK.

title: IBM’s Quantum ‘Cat’ Roars: 120-Qubit Breakthrough Pushes Bitcoin’s Encryption Risk Closer
contentSnippet: IBM’s new 120-qubit experiment marks a leap forward, advancing technology that could one day crack Bitcoin’s encryption.

title: Why $71 Billion Bitcoin Behemoth Strategy Is Still Betting on BTC Hitting $150K This Year
contentSnippet: Strategy founder Michael Saylor thinks Bitcoin will grind its way to $150,000 this year, despite the dip from its recent all-time high.

title: MetaMask Maker Consensys Plans IPO With JPMorgan, Goldman: Axios
contentSnippet: Consensys, the Ethereum software firm behind MetaMask, has reportedly hired JPMorgan and Goldman Sachs to prepare for a potential IPO

title: Putin Boasts of Testing Poseidon Nuclear Drone Meant to Unleash Radioactive Tsunamis
contentSnippet: Putin touts tests of Russia’s nuclear “Poseidon” drone, built to trigger radioactive tsunamis—analysts see posturing, not proof.

title: Humanoid Hype Meets Reality: 1X's $20K NEO Home Robot Draws Skepticism, Memes
contentSnippet: Initial hype for the 1X NEO cooled after demos showed the robot was still fully tele-operated, sparking skepticism online.

title: Bitcoin Sentiment Slides as Market Dips: Why Bearish Odds Are Now Increasing
contentSnippet: Bitcoin falling on Fed rate cut news? Here's what happened, and what to expect in the near term.

title: President Trump's Solana Meme Coin Is Hot Again, Jumping 46% Amid 'Relief Rally'
contentSnippet: President Trump appears to be easing his trade war for now, helping his Solana meme coin pump amid what an analyst called a “relief rally.”

title: Chainlink Drops, Then Bounces 4% as FOMC Volatility Drives Crypto Market
contentSnippet: The oracle network token overcame selling pressure earlier Wednesday, but the technical picture remains mixed.

title: Consensys Plans Public Debut, Taps JPMorgan and Goldman Sachs to Lead IPO: Axios
contentSnippet: The MetaMask maker’s public debut could be the biggest Ethereum-native listing yet, amid a wave of crypto firms hitting U.S. markets.

title: Mastercard Eyes Zero Hash Acquisition for Nearly $2B Bet on Stablecoins: Report
contentSnippet: The global payments firm previously held talks to acquire crypto payment infrastructure startup BNVK, according to reports.

title: 21Shares Applies for Hyperliquid ETF as New Crypto Funds Hit Market
contentSnippet: The U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission now has over 90 filings to consider as fund managers push for altcoin products.

title: Warren, Sanders Blast Trump Admin for Legitimizing 'Dangerous' Bitcoin and Crypto 401Ks
contentSnippet: In a letter sent to the SEC and Department of Labor, the senators warned that the Trump admin’s push to expose the $31 trillion retirement savings industry to crypto could end in disaster.

title: What Bitcoin Chart Says About BTC Price After Powell Casts Doubt on December Cut?
contentSnippet: BTC is down but not out following Powell's hakwish commentary on rates.

title: Bitcoin Tumbles Back to $110K on Fed's Powell's Hawkish Comments
contentSnippet: Though acknowledging growing weakness in the labor market, Powell said a December rate cut is not a "foregone conclusion."

title: Fed Delivers Expected 25 Basis Point Rate Cut as Markets Await Powell’s Comments
contentSnippet: Headed lower on Wednesday ahead of the decision, bitcoin remained so in the minutes following the news at $111,700, down 3% over the past 24 hours.

title: Stellar Edges 1.5% Higher Breaking $0.32 Amid Institutional Accumulation
contentSnippet: XLM demonstrates resilience with modest gains and exceptional volume surge, signaling potential momentum building beneath current consolidation patterns.

title: Analysts Expect Strong Q3 for Coinbase But Disagree Sharply on Its Future
contentSnippet: Barclays, JP Morgan and Compass Point see gains in USDC and trading, but clash over Base, Deribit and profit margins.

title: Investment Bank Mizuho Says Visa Is Becoming the ‘Stablecoin of Stablecoins’
contentSnippet: Visa’s growing stablecoin network positions it as the key infrastructure player in blockchain payments, while individual tokens risk becoming commoditized assets.

title: HBAR Consolidates at $0.2010 as Volume Surge Signals Distribution
contentSnippet: Hedera faces selling pressure at $0.2055 resistance as trading volume explodes 137% above average, marking institutional distribution amid choppy price action.

title: 平将明議員、高市内閣で新たなポジションに就任　引き続き「Web3政策」の中核担う
contentSnippet: 石破前政権でデジタル大臣を務めた平将明氏が、自民党のサイバーセキュリティ本部長とWeb3小委員会委員長に就任。暗号資産税制改革のホワイトペーパーを取りまとめた実績を持つ平氏が、党内で政策立案の中枢を担う。

title: GrayscaleソラナETF上場控え　市場の熱気高まる
contentSnippet: グレースケールのソラナETF（GSOL）が29日にNYSE Arcaで取引開始。先行するビットワイズBSOLは初日5600万ドルの出来高を記録し、2025年上場の仮想通貨ETF中で最大に。米政府閉鎖下でも市場は活発な動き。

title: 株主優待に「仮想通貨XRP」導入、SBIインシュアランスG
contentSnippet: SBIインシュアランスグループが株主優待に仮想通貨XRPを導入。100株以上の保有で最大1.2万円相当を進呈。暗号資産優待の導入が国内でも広がりを見せている。

title: トム・リー率いるビットマイン、170億円相当のETHを新規購入か＝Lookonchain報告
contentSnippet: トム・リー氏率いるビットマインが約173億円相当のイーサリアムを新規購入かと報告。保有額は2兆円超え、世界最大のETH保有企業として総供給量の2.8%を保有。株式の流動性も米国46位にランクイン。

title: バイナンス、3銘柄を11月上場廃止予定
contentSnippet: 大手仮想通貨取引所バイナンスがフラミンゴ、カデナ、パーペチュアルプロトコルの現物取引ペアを11月12日に上場廃止すると発表した。定期審査の結果、業界基準を満たさないと判断された。

title: 【2026年度】仮想通貨（暗号資産）の最新税制要望から読み解く今後の法改正シナリオ｜Aerial Partners寄稿
contentSnippet: JVCEAと金融庁が2025年に提出した仮想通貨税制の最新要望を解説。ETF導入、申告分離課税、株式等同等扱いの3つの改正シナリオと、今後の制度変更に向けて準備すべきことを整理する。

title: RWAトークン化企業セキュリタイズ、SPAC上場決定　評価額は約1900億円
contentSnippet: RWAトークン化大手のSecuritizeが、Cantor Equity Partners IIとのSPAC合併により株式上場を発表。企業価値12.5億ドル、ブラックロックなど既存投資家が全株保有。市場シェア20%を占める最大手プラットフォーム。

title: 米ビットコインETF、ブラックロック除外では年初来マイナスフローに
contentSnippet: K33のアナリストが、米国の仮想通貨ビットコイン現物ETFの年初来流入がIBITに集中していると指摘。ブラックロックの役割の大きさが示されている。

title: リップルやSBI出資のエバーノース、10億ドル相当のXRPを保有＝オンチェーンデータ
contentSnippet: エバーノースが約3.89億XRPを購入し、投資額は9.47億ドルに達したことが分かった。既に5000万ドル以上の含み益を得ている。

title: 万博提供のデジタルウォレット、約100万ダウンロード達成
contentSnippet: 大阪・関西万博で提供された「EXPO2025デジタルウォレット」が約100万ダウンロードを達成。会期中に累計590万件の取引を処理した。10月31日より「HashPort Wallet」へリニューアルし、マルチチェーン対応やDEX機能を搭載する。
